content.json: **Welcome!** This workbook presents metrics from Cost Management. Use the filters below to be more precise.
**Warning!** Resources with no tags could not appear in this workbook. Use the `Cost Management + Billing` view to see exhaustive, consolidated costs.

parameters.name: Organizations
parameters.query:
distinct tostring(tags['organization'])
| where tags_organization != ''
| project value = tags_organization, label = tags_organization
| order by label

parameters.name: Applications
parameters.query:
distinct tostring(tags['application'])
| where tags_application != ''
| project value = tags_application, label = tags_application
| order by label

parameters.name: Environments
parameters.query:
distinct tostring(tags['environment'])
| where tags_environment != ''
| project value = tags_environment, label = tags_environment
| order by label

parameters.name: AppServicePlans
parameters.label: App Service plans
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'Microsoft.Web/serverfarms'
| where not(kind startswith 'functionapp')
| where tags['organization'] in ({Organizations:value})
| where tags['application'] in ({Applications:value})
| where tags['environment'] in ({Environments:value})
| extend group = strcat(tags['organization'], ' - ', tags['environment'])
| order by group asc, name asc
| project value = id, label = name, group

parameters.name: FunctionsApps
parameters.label: Functions apps
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'Microsoft.Web/sites'
| where kind startswith 'functionapp'
| where tags['organization'] in ({Organizations:value})
| where tags['application'] in ({Applications:value})
| where tags['environment'] in ({Environments:value})
| extend group = strcat(tags['organization'], ' - ', tags['environment'])
| order by group asc, name asc
| project value = id, label = name, group

parameters.name: CosmosAccounts
parameters.label: Cosmos DB accounts
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/databaseAccounts'
| where tags['organization'] in ({Organizations:value})
| where tags['application'] in ({Applications:value})
| where tags['environment'] in ({Environments:value})
| extend group = strcat(tags['organization'], ' - ', tags['environment'])
| order by group asc, name asc
| project value = id, label = name, group

parameters.name: StorageAccounts
parameters.label: Storage accounts
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts'
| where tags['organization'] in ({Organizations:value})
| where tags['application'] in ({Applications:value})
| where tags['environment'] in ({Environments:value})
| extend group = strcat(tags['organization'], ' - ', tags['environment'])
| order by group asc, name asc
| project value = id, label = name, group

parameters.name: LogAnalyticsWorkspaces
parameters.label: Log Analytics workspaces
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces'
| where tags['organization'] in ({Organizations:value})
| where tags['application'] in ({Applications:value})
| where tags['environment'] in ({Environments:value})
| extend group = strcat(tags['organization'], ' - ', tags['environment'])
| order by group asc, name asc
| project value = id, label = name, group

content.title: Costs metrics - All resources (no tags here)

content.json: This section presents main billable metrics for operations. Other operations, not in this section, may be billable!

content.query:
Resources
| where type =~ 'Microsoft.Web/serverfarms'
| where not(kind =~ 'functionapp')
| where tags['organization'] in ({Organizations:value})
| where tags['application'] in ({Applications:value})
| where tags['environment'] in ({Environments:value})
| sort by name asc
| project ['App Service plan'] = id, ['Kind'] = kind, ['SKU'] = sku['name']
content.title: App Service Plan SKUs

content.query: {"version":"Merge/1.0","merges":[{"id":"db74b73f-da08-4ecc-ba93-eba02c0db4c7","mergeType":"innerunique","leftTable":"App Service Plan SKUs","rightTable":"App Service Plan Metrics","leftColumn":"App Service plan","rightColumn":"Name"}],"projectRename":[{"originalName":"[App Service Plan SKUs].App Service plan","mergedName":"App Service plan","fromId":"db74b73f-da08-4ecc-ba93-eba02c0db4c7"},{"originalName":"[App Service Plan SKUs].Kind","mergedName":"Kind","fromId":"db74b73f-da08-4ecc-ba93-eba02c0db4c7"},{"originalName":"[App Service Plan SKUs].SKU","mergedName":"SKU","fromId":"db74b73f-da08-4ecc-ba93-eba02c0db4c7"},{"originalName":"[App Service Plan Metrics].CPU","mergedName":"CPU","fromId":"db74b73f-da08-4ecc-ba93-eba02c0db4c7"},{"originalName":"[App Service Plan Metrics].CPU Timeline","mergedName":"CPU Timeline","fromId":"db74b73f-da08-4ecc-ba93-eba02c0db4c7"},{"originalName":"[App Service Plan Metrics].Memory (Max)","mergedName":"Memory (Max)","fromId":"db74b73f-da08-4ecc-ba93-eba02c0db4c7"},{"originalName":"[App Service Plan Metrics].Memory (Max) Timeline","mergedName":"Memory (Max) Timeline","fromId":"db74b73f-da08-4ecc-ba93-eba02c0db4c7"},{"originalName":"[App Service Plan Metrics].Subscription"},{"originalName":"[App Service Plan Metrics].Name"}]}
content.title: App Service plans Billable metrics

content.json: This section presents main billable metrics for storage. Other storage items, not in this section, may be billable!

content.title: Storage Billable metrics - Data by Region

items.name: Storage Billable metrics - Data by Region

content.json: This section presents main billable metrics for monitoring. Other monitoring items, not in this section, may be billable!

content.query:
union withsource = tt *
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where _IsBillable == 'True'
| project ['Application'] = tostring(split(_ResourceId, "/")[8])
| summarize ['Transactions' ] = count() by ['Application']
| project ['Application'], ['Transactions']
| order by ['Transactions'] desc
content.title: Log Analytics workspaces Billable metrics - Transactions

items.name: Log Analytics workspaces Billable metrics - Transactions

content.query:
union withsource = tt *
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where _IsBillable == 'True'
| project _BilledSize, ['Application'] = tostring(split(_ResourceId, "/")[8])
| summarize ['Billed Size' ] = sum(_BilledSize) by ['Application']
| project ['Application'], ['Billed Size']
| order by ['Billed Size'] desc
content.title: Log Analytics workspaces Billable metrics - Billed Size

items.name: Log Analytics workspaces Billable metrics - Billed Size

content.query:
union withsource = tt *
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where _IsBillable == 'True'
| project ['Table'] = tt
| summarize ['Transactions' ] = count() by ['Table']
| project ['Table'], ['Transactions']
| order by ['Transactions'] desc
content.title: Log Analytics workspaces Billable metrics - Transactions

items.name: Log Analytics workspaces Billable metrics - Transactions

content.query:
union withsource = tt *
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where _IsBillable == 'True'
| project _BilledSize, ['Table'] = tt
| summarize ['Billed Size' ] = sum(_BilledSize) by ['Table']
| project ['Table'], ['Billed Size']
| order by ['Billed Size'] desc
content.title: Log Analytics workspaces Billable metrics - Billed Size

items.name: Log Analytics workspaces Billable metrics - Billed Size

content.query:
union withsource = tt *
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where _IsBillable == 'True'
| project TimeGenerated, _BilledSize, ['Application'] = _ResourceId
| summarize ['Transactions' ] = count(), ['Billed Size'] = sum(_BilledSize) by ['Application']
| join kind = leftouter (
    union withsource = tt * 
    | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
    | where _IsBillable == 'True'
    | project TimeGenerated, _BilledSize, ['Application'] = _ResourceId
    | make-series ['Transactions Timeline'] = count() default = 0, ['Billed Size Timeline'] = sum(_BilledSize) default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, now(), {TimeRange:grain}) by ['Application']
    | project-away TimeGenerated
) on ['Application']
| project ['Application'], ['Transactions'], ['Transactions Timeline'], ['Billed Size'], ['Billed Size Timeline']
| order by ['Application'] asc
content.title: Log Analytics workspaces Billable metrics
